definition: not open, move so that an opening or passage is obstructed
details:
adjective
- not open
= example: not open
= synonyms: unopen, closed, nonopening
- used especially of mouth or eyes
= synonyms: closed
verb
- move so that an opening or passage is obstructed
= example: move so that an opening or passage is obstructed
= synonyms: close
- become closed
= synonyms: close
- prevent from entering
= example: prevent from entering
= synonyms: bar
